Question: Kneron Taiwan Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Kneron Taiwan Co., Ltd

Product: KL730 AI Chip

- Lower-cost and energy-efficient alternative to Nvidia Corp’s GPUs for generative pre-trained transformer (GPT) solutions
- Deploying Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co’s (TSMC) 12-nanometer process technology
- 150 to 200 percent more energy-efficient than products manufactured by major industry peers
- Suitable for enterprise-edge servers, smart home applications, and advanced driver-assistance system applications
- Available for sampling by customers by the end of the year
- Interest from automakers for full-frame detection in advanced driver-assistance systems
- Raised more than US$140 million, backed by investors including Qualcomm Ventures, Hon Hai Precision Industry Co, Horizons Ventures Ltd, and Sequoia Capital
Summary_cn:
Kneron Taiwan有限公司

产品：KL730 AI芯片

- 比Nvidia公司的图形处理器（GPU）更经济且能效更高，可用于生成式预训练变换器（GPT）解决方案
- 使用台积电（TSMC）12纳米制程技术
- 能效比主要行业竞争对手的产品提高150至200％
- 适用于企业边缘服务器、智能家居应用和高级驾驶辅助系统应用
- 将于年底提供给客户进行抽样测试
- 汽车制造商对高级驾驶辅助系统的全景检测表现出兴趣
- 获得了超过1.4亿美元的融资，投资者包括高通风险投资、鸿海精密工业股份有限公司、Horizons Ventures Ltd和红杉资本
